description: A short walk (20 minutes) through NTS Map:92F12.  an area that had a fire go through it 20 years ago.  Lots of scorched old trees with lots of new growth.  The big fir trees survived but nothing else.  Nothing special but everybody is different.  If you are in the area worth a stop.
directions: Take the Island highway north to Campbell River, hang a left onto highway 28.  Then take Westmin Road south to Auger Point parking lot. About 1.5 hours from Courtenay.
title: Auger Point
